remarks: A corollary of ~ disjenex .  If ` F ` is an injection from ` A ` to ` B ` then ` G ` is a right inverse of ` F ` from ` B ` to a superset of ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2015.)
statement:
domss2.1 $e |- G = `' ( F u. ( 1st |` ( ( B \ ran F ) X. { ~P U. ran A } ) ) ) $.
domss2 $p |- ( ( F : A -1-1-> B /\ A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ( G : B -1-1-onto-> ran G /\ A C_ ran G /\ ( G o. F ) = ( _I |` A ) ) ) $.
